sources.name: United Nations Framework Convention on Climate Change

fields.name: Kind
fields.description: Kind of deposited instruments of ratification, acceptance, approval or accession.

fields.name: Emissions
fields.description: Emissions in GgCO₂-equiv. reported for the purposes of Article 21

fields.name: Year

name: paris-agreement-entry-into-force
title: Entry Into Force of the Paris Climate Agreement
description: Combined dataset of signature, and ratification, acceptance or approval status of the Paris Climate Agreement and the emissions shares used for entry into force.
